dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 2103 IH: Julian Woods Yellow Ribbon Program Expansion Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Rutherford (for himself and Mr. Peters) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to include the Frye Scholarship in the Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Julian Woods Yellow Ribbon Program Expansion Act.

section.header: Inclusion of Frye Scholarship recipients in Yellow Ribbon G.I. Education Enhancement Program
section.text: Section 3317(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by striking paragraphs (1) and (2) of section 3311(b) and inserting paragraphs (1), (2), and (9) of section 3311(b) of this title.
